statements: SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent = FALSE
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, reminder_date FROM appointments WHERE reminder_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name FROM appointments ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE reminder_date IS NULL
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, DATE_FORMAT(appointment_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointments
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE status = 'scheduled'
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_datetime FROM appointments WHERE appointment_datetime > '2022-04-01 10:00:00'
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY appointment_datetime DESC
SELECT reminder_message FROM reminders WHERE reminder_datetime BETWEEN '2022-04-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-04-02 00:00:00'
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE status='scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_datetime DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id FROM appointments WHERE patient_id=1001 AND status='scheduled' LIMIT 5;
SELECT appointments.appointment_id, reminders.reminder_datetime, reminders.reminder_message FROM appointments INNER JOIN reminders ON appointments.appointment_id = reminders.appointment_id;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_datetime, status FROM appointments WHERE appointment_datetime BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments, status FROM appointments GROUP BY status ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, email FROM patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT appointment_id, reminder_date, reminder_time FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE patients.email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE DATE(reminder_date) <= CURDATE() AND reminder_time <= CURTIME();

SELECT patient_name, phone_number, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='Female';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT appointment_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM Appointments GROUP BY appointment_type ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_type = 'Checkup' AND appointment_status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Providers WHERE provider_phone_number LIKE '%123%';

SELECT * FROM Reminders WHERE reminder_type = 'Follow-up' ORDER BY reminder_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_notes FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_contact FROM patients;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_contact FROM providers;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_notes FROM appointments;

SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM providers WHERE provider_specialty IS NOT NULL ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
